scripts.test: npm run tsc && find dist -iname '*.js' | NODE_ENV=test xargs -n1 node | tap-merge
scripts.watch: fswatch -0 -Ei ".*\.ts$" -Ee ".*\.ts" src | NODE_ENV=test xargs -0 -n1 -I {} bash -c "clear && ts-node {} | tap-min"
scripts.build: eval $(aws ecr get-login --region=us-west-2) && V=v$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); docker build -t 878160042194.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/dispatch:${V} .; docker push 878160042194.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/dispatch:${V}
